duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct research and development in metal additive manufacturing (AM) with a focus on process optimization, alloy design, and compositional grading in AM components.
Characterize metal AM components using advanced microscopy techniques and mechanical testing.
Design and perform complex experiments, analyze resulting datasets, and collaborate with a multidisciplinary team to achieve research goals.
Publish papers in high-impact peer-reviewed scientific journals and present results at conferences.
Maintain laboratory protocols, adhere to safety and security protocols, and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in Material Science, Physics, Chemistry, Mechanical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, or related field. Bachelor's degree with experience also considered.
